# Oliver Maith

![](images/profile.JPG){.preview-image width=40%}

Hi I'm Oliver

I am highly interested in computational neuroscience, modeling neuronal processes related to cognitive processes and neurophysiological disease. Currently, I am working on linking neuronal data from different scales to computational models of the functional and dysfunctional basal ganglia.
